title: After Champion Select, the game crashes(MAC)
body: I'm trying to play a game. I queue. I pick a champ. Then we go into loading screen and it is blank/black.for 3 days

replies.body:
* Update your **graphics card drivers**
* Disable any custom skins or third party software
* [Update your **DirectX**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq3)
* **Repair any corrupt files** through settings (gear icon, top right of client) > Initiate Full Repair
* **Clean reinstall your game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)

If none of that fixes your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
Maybe no one knows how to fix it{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
